start.text: Hmmm, this might actually be worth my time.
Awfully stormy for this time of year.
Gotta love the payout on ships.

start_boss.text: Buck up. We're taking this thing down.
I always preferred normal patrols to these things, even with the better payout. Pain in my ass to take down.
That's a lot of ships. What gives?
My readings are going off the wire!

retreat.text: Even when I'm an admiral, I still end up burning away.
We've been made, let's punch it.

engaged.text: Merging to engage! Show me a fight!
Copy, let's make some scratch. Turning to intercept.

need_help.text: We're having a really, really bad day over here.

pursuing.text: Come on, you blowhards! Come take me on!
They know what they've signed up for! Just keep fighting!
Rack them up! Let me at them!

running.text: Ah, frickin' knew it, I'm outta here.
Square up, you pansies! You're not backing off!
God, what are these idiots doing?

hull_90.text: This is what I signed up for! Go on, come on!
Any poor bastard who wants to come play, I'll entertain.

hull_50.text: Calm down, we can do this!

hull_30.text: Come on, you pissants! Shoot me down! I'm waiting for it!
How hard it is to take down one ship, huh?! Come on!

overload.text: Hang in there! Not much longer, now!
You have had here to kill me! Show something of it!

death.text: What we're promised is worth what we're doing.

victory.text: This wasn't much of a fight. I think we're fine by my mark.
Good to know we still know our way around a dogfight.
We're the better pilots, that's how. Screw 'em all. I wish they stayed.
This war's gotta end at some point. I'm just glad to be picking up what pay I can.

victory_boss.text: One hell of a night out, I think.
